mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.book_payment_item_sid, t.book_payment_sid, t.item_num, t.currency_amount_tax_fk, t.currency_amount_tax_hxz, t2.currency_amount_tax_yhx, t2.currency_amount_tax_dhx, t.refer_doc_category, t.refer_doc_sid, t.refer_doc_code, t.refer_doc_item_sid, t.refer_doc_item_code, t.tax_rate, t.clear_status, t.account_valid_date, t.new_payment_use_date, t.remark, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.data_source_sys, t.is_finance_verify, t3.product_season_sid, t3.agent, u1.nick_name as agent_name, t4.product_season_name from s_fin_book_payment_item t LEFT JOIN s_fin_book_payment t1 ON t.book_payment_sid = t1.book_payment_sid LEFT JOIN () t2 ON t.book_payment_item_sid = t2.book_payment_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill t3 on t.refer_doc_sid = t3.pay_bill_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t4 on t3.product_season_sid = t4.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 on t3.agent = u1.user_name

SELECT t.book_payment_item_sid, t.book_payment_sid, t1.book_source_category, t.currency_amount_tax_fk, IF(t1.book_source_category = 'YFK', IFNULL(t2.currency_amount_tax_yu, 0), t.currency_amount_tax_yhx) as currency_amount_tax_yhx, IF(t1.book_source_category = 'YFK', (t.currency_amount_tax_fk - IFNULL(t3.currency_amount_tax_yu, 0)), (t.currency_amount_tax_fk - t.currency_amount_tax_yhx)) as currency_amount_tax_dhx FROM s_fin_book_payment_item t LEFT JOIN s_fin_book_payment t1 ON t.book_payment_sid = t1.book_payment_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i1.book_payment_sid, SUM(i1.currency_amount_tax) as currency_amount_tax_yu FROM s_fin_pay_bill_item_yufu i1 LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill i2 ON i1.pay_bill_sid = i2.pay_bill_sid WHERE i2.handle_status = '5' GROUP BY i1.book_payment_sid ) t2 ON t.book_payment_sid = t2.book_payment_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i1.book_payment_sid, SUM(i1.currency_amount_tax) as currency_amount_tax_yu FROM s_fin_pay_bill_item_yufu i1 LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill i2 ON i1.pay_bill_sid = i2.pay_bill_sid WHERE i2.handle_status = '5' OR i2.handle_status = '3' GROUP BY i1.book_payment_sid ) t3 ON t.book_payment_sid = t3.book_payment_sid
